##############################################################################
#                                 Game Info :                                #
##############################################################################
#                                                                            #
# TIM BURTON&#039;S THE NIGHTMARE BEFORE CHRISTMAS: OOGIE&#039;S REVENGE is an action  #
# adventure game that continues the story of Jack Skellington and his arch   #
# nemesis, Oogie Boogie.Players take on the role of Jack, who must battle    #
# bizarre and vicious enemies in order to stop the diabolical Oogie Boogie   #
# from kidnapping the leaders of all the Holidays and establishing himself   #
# as king. Armed with the amazing "Soul Robber" and the ability to transform #
# into other forms, Jack will have to use everything at his disposal to      #
# defeat this evil plan.                                                     #
#                                                                            #
##############################################################################
#                                Other Shit :                                #
